# Barracks (Building)
## Overview
**Barracks**

**Create** 80 Goods, 18 Influence, 73 Labor, 1 Magic (3,700 gp)

**Rooms** 2 [[Armory (Room)|Armories]], 1 [[Bedroom (Room)|Bedroom]], 2 [[Bunks (Room)|Bunks]], 1 [[19a - Common Room|Common Room]], 1 [[Dojo (Room)|Dojo]], 1 [[Guard Post (Room)|Guard Post]], 1 [[Infirmary (Room)|Infirmary]], 1 [[Kitchen (Room)|Kitchen]], 1 [[Lavatory (Room)|Lavatory]], 1 [[Office (Room)|Office]], 1 [[Storage (Room)|Storage]]

A building to house guards, militias, or other military forces.
